== Running Tomcat on port 80 ==

Following these tips: http://hacksforge.com/How-to-run-Tomcat-on-port-80.html

On bpm.inf.ufsm.br:
{{{
pacman -S iptables
vim /etc/rc.conf
iptables -nvL
rc.d start iptables
iptables -t nat -I PREROUTING -p tcp --dport 80 -j REDIRECT --to-port 8080
rc.d save iptables
rc.d restart iptables
}}}
